pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, October 26, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the swearing-in ceremony of members of the 29th Canadian Ministry. An official photo of the Governor General with members of the Canadian Ministry will follow the ceremony.

Due to limited space and physical distancing requirements, spectators are asked to observe the ceremony from home and not attend in person.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage of the ceremony and official photo
  • Media should arrive at the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 8:45 a.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists who are not members of the Parliamentary Press Gallery should contact Philippe Perrier at philippe.perrier@parl.gc.ca to obtain temporary accreditation.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Room 100
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
